name: MultiSkype
short_description:
This VB.Net app requires .Net Framework 3.0 (Present in Windows 7 and 8)

It allows you to start multiple Skype accounts at once.
It can be started manually or you can create a shortcut in the start folder of the Windows Start menu.

To create accounts and password, a button will be enabled at startup to access the configuration screen.

That will allow a form to add or delete accounts.
The accounts data are stored in a text files, the passwords are encrypted.

The version 0.5 solves the UAC problems on Windows 7 and 8 by storing the config files in a user's local folder.

If you want the code, send me an email at m4xsm4rt@gmail.com

Be seeing you!

------------------------------------------------------------------------
This app has no commercial purpose, the Skype logo has been used without permission. It can be deleted if requested.
The application don't look for Skype, it doesn't download it if not found.
It has not been tested on machines without Skype.
summary: Application that allows you to start multiple Skype accounts at once.
